page.title: 18EDUCATION
page.content: A TYPICAL DAY AT SCHOOL.We begin at 9.oo a.m. and end at 3.15 p.m. We always start with an assembly.We sing a hymn,have a story,say a few prayers and finally sing another hymn. After assembly we either do language,Maths. or,on Fridays, have a spelling test.At 10.40 a.m.we have play-time which ends at 10.55 a.m.We then do History,Maths, Science or Geography.We sometimes have a quiz. At 12.15 p.m. we have lunch. After we have a long play which ends at 1.15 p.m. We then do either music, Religious Educ.,Physical Educ. or handwriting depending upon the day. On Tuesdays and Thursdays at 2.00 p.m. we learn French on Fridays we have games,on Wednesdays we have art.In any spare time we finish work or read.In summer we play cricket and rounders and in the winter we play football and netball.We go to school 5 days a week.
